oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Missing...
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: This World War II era poster features an image of a young boy climbing a set of stairs in a residential home. The poster includes text that tells the story of how a young child might respond to the notice that his father is ""Missing in action."" The poster is produced by the Chesapeake and Ohio Railway and was used as an advertisement for the company.
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Chesapeake and Ohio Railway
oai_dc:dc.dc:source: World War I and World War II Poster Collection
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: World War, 1939-1945; Posters
